creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: three larger characters at top center; two parallel lines below of looping writing; circular relief stamp URC; two square intaglio stamps at bottom; gold border
inscription:
Inscription and Seals

\"Mount Fuji\" Snow melts on its eight faces / As the rising sun sparkles elegantly; / Just like a person of great virtue / Whose character is warm like jade. (SA)
markings: URC, circular relief; LLC, two square intaglio
title: Mount Fuji
